Key Match Events: Thomas Bryant recorded 22 points, eight rebounds, two steals, and one assist in the game against the Chicago Bulls.
Bryant had a couple of important putbacks in key moments of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Indiana head coach Rick Carlisle praised Thomas Bryant for his efficient and smart play, stating that he was always in the right place at the right time and brought positive energy.
Pascal Siakam highlighted Bryant's opportunity to play hard, bring energy, and set screens, noting that he is taking advantage of it.
Tyrese Haliburton complimented Bryant's energy and willingness to do the right things.
Thomas Bryant expressed gratitude towards his teammates for embracing him and helping him integrate into their offense and defense.
